name: Tor-Tunas
author: bizycooker
summary: A super fun and easy way to serve the usual tuna fish. Just wrap in a tortilla! My kids have been loving these for years, as I did when I was a kid. Awesome for lunch boxes, just wrap in plastic wrap or foil. The kids love calling them 'Tor-tunas'!
ingredients: 1 teaspoon lemon juice, or to taste
1 pinch garlic salt, or to taste
directions: Mix tuna, mayonnaise, pickle relish, onion, celery, lemon juice, and garlic salt together in a bowl
Lay 1 lettuce leaf on each tortilla
Spoon tuna mixture in a line across the middle of each tortilla
Fold opposing edges of the tortilla to overlap the filling
Roll 1 of the opposing edges around the filling in a burrito-style
